attributes.action: make all places that sell food provide information on the source of the food, particularly meat products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Welfare standards- clear defined meanings only, such things as 'farm fresh' to be banned propsed categories factory, intensive, free range, organic
In addition it would be good to know country of origin, and organic or not for vegetables and fruit as well.
